headline: Cloudflare and Aruba partner to deliver a seamless global secure network from the branch to the cloud

description: Today we are excited to announce that Cloudflare and Aruba are working together to develop a solution that will enable Aruba customers to connect EdgeConnect SD-WANâ€™s with Cloudflare's global network to further secure their corporate traffic with Cloudflare One
